Uttarakhand.application_info: Apuni Sarkar intends to provide multiple services from various departments to citizens.
The Minority Welfare Department of Uttarakhand is committed to the implementation, operation and coordination of the social and economic schemes for minority sections in the society.
Citizen can check their ration card details, commodity balance, last 6 months transaction details and Nearest Fair Price Shop

Social Welfare Department caters the need of the most deprived, vulnerable and weakest sections of the society by providing assistance to dependent old- aged ,differently-abled, widows, scheduled caste,scheduled tribe,other backward class etc.
Users can apply for various police services.
UK-UPCL provides all the account and bill related services to its users

Jharkhand.application_info: Jan Van Yojana is implemented to maintain environmental balance by increasing the green cover of the state

Jharkhand.application_name: Department of Personnel, Administrative Reforms and Raj Bhasa
Jharkhand.application_info: Caste Certificate for EBC I and BC II
Issue of Marriage Registration Certificate under The Jharkhand Cumpulsory Marriage Act 2017
Jharkhand eKalyan Application has been developed to facilitate the prematric student to track the status of their Scholarship.

Jharkhand government has launched Two Wheeler Petrol Subsidy Scheme from 26 January 2022 across the state. This scheme offers Rs. 25 per litre relief on fuel (petrol / diesel) price in the form of cashback for 2 wheelers to the poor people.
Citizen can check their ration card details, commodity balance, last 6 months transaction details and Nearest Fair Price Shop
View and Download your vehicle Registration Certificate (from Digilocker).
Baba Saheb Bhimrao Ambedkar Awaas Yojna is completely a state sponsored scheme, under which eligible households get benefits who are not benefited under PMAY-G.

Odisha.application_info: Citizen can check their ration card details, commodity balance, last 6 months transaction details and Nearest Fair Price Shop
Parivahan Sewa- Sarathi application allows Citizen to apply for LLR, download, view or upload their licence in DigiLocker.

Bihar.application_info: Citizen can check their ration card details, commodity balance, last 6 months transaction details and Nearest Fair Price Shop
Citizens of Bihar can use this Application to verify the status of their pension payments under various schemes.
Students from Bihar's backward and economically disadvantaged communities can check the status of their Post Matric Scholarship applications.

Sikkim.application_name: Department of Food Civil Supplies and Consumer Affairs (Sikkim)
Sikkim.application_info: The department of Department of Food Civil Supplies and Consumer Affairs (Sikkim), manages Direct Benefits Transfer Scheme for foodgrains in Sikkim. User can apply for Ration card using this Department Tile.

Sikkim.application_info: Dealer License from Legal Metrology Unit
Allotment of Temporary Permission for Mega Events from UDD

Ladakh.application_info: The AICTE accredits postgraduate and graduate programs under specific categories at Indian institutions as per its charter. The user can check approved institutes, apply for PG and PMSSS Scholarship.

Ladakh.application_name: Department of Food Civil Supplies and Consumer Affairs (Ladakh)
Ladakh.application_info: The department of Department of Food Civil Supplies and Consumer Affairs (Ladakh), manages Direct Benefits Transfer Scheme for foodgrains in Ladakh. User can apply for Ration card using this Department Tile.
